name: Omega Consulting Intl SAS
goal:
Our organization represents and works with Subsea interconnection producers, renewable energy project promoters, energy transmission projects, innovation, 3D printing, additive manufacturing.

Our goal is to provide advocacy for their interests, and relate EU priorities to our clients to align goals to achieve cost effective, relevant, and timely to market approaches.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Energy, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and Technology, Transport
